title: Roadhog is what Urgot should have always been.
body:
lets be honest. the whole "anti-AD carry" theme was lack luster at best.

give Urgot Roadhog's kit (kind of?)

I hope they do a Sion level rework for him... poor guy has been in a bad spot since i can remember.

yes i knoow roadhog is a tank while urgot is a ranged bruiser/adc monstrocity, but he needs a new identity to solve the problems he has. it isn't his kit or numbers... it is flat out the role he was given that had failed him.

pls. even Urgot needs love.
